title: Modifier
description: A modifier allows for conditional inclusion of tokens via the contexts map. Similar to a set, but with multiple contexts representing different variations (e.g., light/dark themes, small/medium/large sizes).

description.description: A human-readable description of the modifier

contexts.description: Map of context names to token sources. Each key represents a possible context value, and the value is an array of token sources to apply when that context is selected.

default.description: Default context value. Must match one of the keys in contexts. Used when no input is provided for this modifier.

$extensions.description: Vendor-specific extensions with keys being vendor-specific namespaces
